heading: Update your photo and personal detail here.
name: First Name
caution: This action will delete your profile from MetalMaker 3D.
deleteText: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data, including your profile information, preferences, and saved content. This process cannot be undone.
type: Please type your new email address to confirm. You will receive a confirmation email to your new address.
info1: Your changes won't be submitted until you press the update button.
info3: Delete account will remove all of your information from our database
info4: When moved, the repository will inherit the access rights of the new project
fillLast: Please fill in your last name
deleteOwner: While you are the owner, you cant delete your account. Please, transfer the ownership first.
renameSuccess: The company has been renamed correctly.
onlyOwner: Only the owner can rename the company.
error: There has been an error. Please, try again later.
picRemove: Your profile picture will be removed from the server permanently.
irreversibleTransfer: This action cannot be undone. After this, you will be granted with the 'user' role. If you need further permissions, please, contact the new owner.
